item.title: Mini Macro Pad
item.description: go-mmp Macro Pad driver software, written in Golang. If you have an arduino powered device, you could use this to run various keyboard shortcuts and other macros.

item.title: My Website
item.description: ssebs.com has changed as I’ve learned more webdev skills. Currently, you’re seeing it!

item.title: Perishable Punchers
item.description: Mortal Kombat like Game written in Java, back in highschool.

item.title: CSV Editor
item.description: A lightweight GUI csv editor written in python. Link to code: https://github.
